content.description: A programmer is writing a program to calculate a student’s course grade using the process described. The programmer has the following procedures available.
content.question: Procedure Call Explanation Min (numList) Returns the minimum value in the list numList Sum (numList) Returns the sum of the values in the list numList The student’s individual assignment scores are stored in the list scores. Which of the following can be used to calculate a student’s course grade and store the result in the variable finalGrade?

choices.label: finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Sum (scores) / LENGTH (scores)finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> finalGrade - Min (scores)

finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Sum (scores) / (LENGTH (scores) - 1)finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> finalGrade - Min (scores)

finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Sum (scores) - Min (scores)finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> finalGrade / LENGTH (scores)

finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Sum (scores) - Min (scores)finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> finalGrade / (LENGTH (scores) - 1)

content.answer: finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Sum (scores) - Min (scores)finalGrade <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> finalGrade / (LENGTH (scores) - 1)

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Use abstraction to manage complexity in a program.
